timeline.bodyText: Should clan be the opposite side, as clan units are 5 member versus IS' 4?
timeline.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: It's not based on squad size. It's based on tech base. Each SSW mount on a Clan suit is 40% of the total weapon weight and on an IS suit it's 50% of the weapon weight.
replies.author: neoancient
